entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow. High minus 7 with temperature falling to minus 11 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending late this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Local amount 2 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 7 with temperature falling to minus 11 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 16 this morning and minus 21 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Monday 09 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Monday 09 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 8.
